tv.freewheel.renderers.interfaces
Interface IRendererContext

public interface IRendererContext

Interface for a renderer to obtain information from AdManager.

Method Summary

an IAdInstance

Get constants look up table.

an IConstants object

android.app.Activity getActivity()
Return application's current Activity which create and hold the reference of this AdContext.

Returns:
the Activity object

setRendererCapability

void setRendererCapability(java.lang.String rendererCapability,
                           int status)
Declare capability of the renderer.

Parameters:
rendererCapability - one of EVENT_AD_* (NOT including EVENT_AD_FIRST_QUARTILE, EVENT_AD_THIRD_QUARTILE, EVENT_AD_IMPRESSION) in IConstants
status - the status be set, should be one of:

CAPABILITY_STATUS_ON
CAPABILITY_STATUS_OFF
CAPABILITY_STATUS_DEFAULT
Note:
Changing renderer capability after renderer starts playing may result undefined behaviour.

dispatchEvent

void dispatchEvent(java.lang.String eventName)
Dispatch renderer event.

Parameters:
eventName - event to be processed, one of EVENT_AD_* and EVENT_REQUEST_CONTENT_VIDEO_* in IConstants

dispatchEvent

void dispatchEvent(java.lang.String eventName,
                   java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> extraInfo)
Dispatch renderer event.

Parameters:
eventName - event to be processed, one of EVENT_AD_* and EVENT_REQUEST_CONTENT_VIDEO_* in IConstants
extraInfo - additional information need to be processed by AdManager. Available keys:
- INFO_KEY_ERROR_CODE Optional.
When eventName is EVENT_ERROR, use this key to specify the error code.
- INFO_KEY_ERROR_INFO Optional.
When eventName is EVENT_ERROR, use this key to specify the description of the error.
- INFO_KEY_SHOW_BROWSER Optional.
Only valid when the eventName is EVENT_AD_CLICK, the value should be boolean
use this key to specify whether the click event should open a browser if possible
the default value is true
- INFO_KEY_URL Optional.
Only valid when the eventName is EVENT_AD_CLICK, the value should be String.
use this key to specify redirect URL.
the default value is the one specified on MRM UI.
- INFO_KEY_MESSAGE Optional.
When eventName is EVENT_CLICK, use this key to specify the name of custom click

getLocation

android.location.Location getLocation()
Get the location of device. This value was set by IAdManager.setLocation and will not be change in the AdContext's lifetime.

Returns:
the location value which App set through IAdManager.setLocation. will be null if not set

addOnActivityCallbackListener

void addOnActivityCallbackListener(IActivityCallbackListener listener)
Register event callback listener for Activity's callback event. supported events:
ACTIVITY_CALLBACK_PAUSE
ACTIVITY_CALLBACK_RESUME

Parameters:
listener - the event callback listener to response for the event

scheduleAdInstances

java.util.ArrayList<IAdInstance> scheduleAdInstances(java.util.ArrayList<ISlot> slots)
Schedule ad instances for slots passed in as parameter. Usually slots consists of current slot and its companion slots.

Parameters:
slots - slots to be scheduled for ads
Returns:
ArrayList of scheduled IAdInstance

getCompanionSlots

java.util.ArrayList<ISlot> getCompanionSlots()
Return the companion slots which are able to schedule companion.

Returns:
ArrayList of companion ISlot

getVersion

int getVersion()
Get SDK version.

Returns:
Current version as int, e.g., 0x02060000 for v2.6
